name: Edjanger
body:
### Welcome to edjanger home !
This tool help you to use docker commands in a more compact way. Each docker commands are replaced by a single command which read properties from a configuration file (edjanger.properties).

### Design
edjanger is writed in bash shell scripts and commands are alias to be defined in the environment (user profile or system environment).


### Installation
To install edjanger, [download it](https://github.com/pamtrak06/edjanger/archive/master.zip) and see [installation documentation](https://github.com/pamtrak06/edjanger#how-to-install-edjanger).

### User manual
See [installation documentation](https://github.com/pamtrak06/edjanger#how-to-initialize-an-edjanger-project).

### Authors and Contributors
edjanger is writed with passion (@author: pamtrak06@gmail.com) and under [MIT license](https://github.com/pamtrak06/edjanger/blob/master/LICENSE).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with edjanger? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/pamtrak06/edjanger) or [contact support](pamtrak06@gmail.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
